name: part_017
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade holo＊27 stage【チラ見せ】 [pDLDcU3dWp8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_017.mov

scenes.description: Gawr Gura and Hakos Baelz performing the song 'Sweet Appetite'.
Transition between performances with crowd cheering.
Kazama Iroha performing the song 'Iroha Step!'.
Kazama Iroha's MC section, greeting the audience.

subtitles.original: Patience is just not for me
subtitles.english: Patience is just not for me

subtitles.original: No we can't stop now, not for one second
subtitles.english: No we can't stop now, not for one second

subtitles.original: 'Cause this is only driving me to full-on panic!
subtitles.english: 'Cause this is only driving me to full-on panic!

subtitles.original: I'm so embarrassed right now
subtitles.english: I'm so embarrassed right now

subtitles.original: I'm blushing somehow
subtitles.english: I'm blushing somehow

subtitles.original: But nothing that I seem to do ever bothers you
subtitles.english: But nothing that I seem to do ever bothers you

subtitles.original: Looking in your eyes
subtitles.english: Looking in your eyes

subtitles.original: Just want you to know that I really, really, really like you
subtitles.english: Just want you to know that I really, really, really like you

subtitles.original: Are you embarrassed right now?
subtitles.english: Are you embarrassed right now?

subtitles.original: I'm blushing somehow
subtitles.english: I'm blushing somehow

subtitles.original: But I am guessing it is the same for you and me
subtitles.english: But I am guessing it is the same for you and me

subtitles.original: Look here don't blink
subtitles.english: Look here don't blink

subtitles.original: And tell me what you think
subtitles.english: And tell me what you think

subtitles.original: But we both know the answer now, wouldn't you agree?
subtitles.english: But we both know the answer now, wouldn't you agree?

subtitles.original: What should I do?
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: I hope you don't find out the things I'm shy about
subtitles.english: I hope you don't find out the things I'm shy about

subtitles.original: What should I do?
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: My head is still spinning, the words are big for me
subtitles.english: My head is still spinning, the words are big for me

subtitles.original: What should I do?
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: I hope you don't find out the things I'm shy about
subtitles.english: I hope you don't find out the things I'm shy about

subtitles.original: What should I do?
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: My head is still spinning, the words are big for me
subtitles.english: My head is still spinning, the words are big for me

subtitles.original: I'm only asking for another chance
subtitles.english: I'm only asking for another chance

subtitles.original: Oh pretty please, I promise one last chance
subtitles.english: Oh pretty please, I promise one last chance

subtitles.original: なんだったら 楽勝だ 全部忘れちゃえよ
subtitles.english: If that's the case, it's a breeze, just forget it all

subtitles.original: 舞って這って揺らして
subtitles.english: Dancing, crawling, and swaying

subtitles.original: 楽しんでるでござるかー！
subtitles.english: Are you having a good time?!

subtitles.original: 皆さまも一緒に全力で盛り上げてくださいね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please go all out and get hyped up together!

subtitles.original: 別にいいじゃんか へこんだってOK
subtitles.english: It doesn't really matter, it's okay to feel down

subtitles.original: 後悔へのマッサージです
subtitles.english: It's a massage for your regrets

subtitles.original: 思い通りがお好みなら
subtitles.english: If you prefer things to go your way

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけしんどいかもな
subtitles.english: It might be a little tough

subtitles.original: さっさこらどっこいしょ 今勝ったもん勝ちっしょ
subtitles.english: Sassa kora dokkoisho, it's all about winning in the moment

subtitles.original: 通るだけですごいな ハイ ハイ ハイ ハイ
subtitles.english: It's amazing just passing through! High, High, High, High!

subtitles.original: さっさこらどっこいしょ こんなんすぐにおいな
subtitles.english: Sassa kora dokkoisho, come on quickly with this

subtitles.original: それ違っちゃうじゃん
subtitles.english: That's not right, is it?

subtitles.original: 上がっちゃって ステージ出していこう
subtitles.english: Get hyped and let's go out on stage

subtitles.original: さらば 不安を踏みつけて
subtitles.english: Farewell, stepping over anxiety

subtitles.original: ソー ワンモアステップ 踏み出していこう
subtitles.english: So one more step, let's move forward

subtitles.original: さらば バイバイ 才能飛んでいけ
subtitles.english: Farewell, bye-bye, let talent fly away

subtitles.original: いいとこ見せたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to show my good side

subtitles.original: なんだったら 楽勝だ 全部忘れちゃえよ
subtitles.english: If that's the case, it's a breeze, just forget it all

subtitles.original: セイ！もっと僕になるんだ
subtitles.english: Say! I'll become more like myself

subtitles.original: 間違ったら またいつか 好きじゃんもー
subtitles.english: If I make a mistake, again someday... I love it already!

subtitles.original: なんだったら 楽勝だ 全部忘れちゃえよ
subtitles.english: If that's the case, it's a breeze, just forget it all

subtitles.original: やる気でなくってのそのそムーブOK
subtitles.english: It's okay to move slowly when you have no motivation

subtitles.original: 追い越し追い越されても大丈夫
subtitles.english: It's okay to overtake or be overtaken

subtitles.original: 諦めないことがきっと大正解
subtitles.english: Not giving up is surely the right answer

subtitles.original: 疲れたらちょい休みなよ セイ！
subtitles.english: If you're tired, take a little break. Say!

subtitles.original: 不安になるのは君が君に期待してるの その証拠なんだな セイ！
subtitles.english: Becoming anxious is proof that you're expecting something from yourself. Say!

subtitles.original: 怖くなるなら それは僕も一緒なんだよ 間違えてたい
subtitles.english: If you're getting scared, I'm the same. I want to make mistakes.

subtitles.original: 回っちゃって 足鳴らしていこう
subtitles.english: Let's spin around and stomp our feet

subtitles.original: さらば バイバイ 才能引き寄せ
subtitles.english: Farewell, bye-bye, attracting talent

subtitles.original: ソー ワンモアステップ 飛び乗っていこう
subtitles.english: So one more step, let's jump on

subtitles.original: さらば バイバイ 笑うため セイ！
subtitles.english: Farewell, bye-bye, in order to laugh. Say!

subtitles.english: I want to show my good side

subtitles.english: One more step

subtitles.english: Look, one more step

subtitles.original: まだ終われない
subtitles.english: It's not over yet

subtitles.english: We can't end here

subtitles.english: Isn't it okay not to worry about failure?

subtitles.original: 皆殿、こんにちはでござるー！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, de gozaru~!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生、侍の風真いろはでござるー！
